name: dancer

effect.scarlet_violet: Whenever another Pokémon uses a dance move, this Pokémon will use the same move immediately afterwards.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: Whenever a dance move is used in battle, the Pokémon will copy the user to immediately perform that dance move itself.
